definition: a breed of horse/variant of 歡|欢[huan1]

sentences.english: When they played I'd sing along, it made me smile.
sentences.chinese: 听到播放便随声歌唱，这使我欢畅。

sentences.english: The entire country is behind Qi，and the home-Sheng everything.
sentences.chinese: 举国上下齐欢畅，家和国盛万事兴。

sentences.english: Oh! What fun it is to ride and sing a sleighing song tonight.
sentences.chinese: 噢，我们唱着歌儿，今晚多么欢畅。

sentences.english: It came as a joyous daybreak to end the long light of captivity.
sentences.chinese: 恰似结束漫漫长夜禁锢的欢畅黎明。

sentences.english: The entire country is behind Qi， and the home-Sheng everything.
sentences.chinese: 举国上下齐欢畅，家和国盛万事兴。

sentences.english: In looking on the happy autumn fields.
sentences.chinese: 每当眺望这欢畅的秋野。

sentences.english: Good to meet you, Aunty Su.
Qingyun flies to the Philippines to celebrate Huanchang's birthday with him.
sentences.chinese: 青云在欢畅生日当天飞到菲律宾与他庆祝。

sentences.english: How many love you moments of glace.
sentences.chinese: 多少人爱你年轻欢畅的时候。

sentences.english: I said happy time, want to have a shower, drizzle for joy to everyone.
sentences.chinese: 我说欢畅的时候，想沐浴细雨淋散喜悦带予所有人。

sentences.english: And may our cheerful hearts continually feast on your love.
sentences.chinese: 也愿我们欢畅的心常享祢的爱宴。

sentences.english: The entire country is behind Qi, and the home-Sheng everything. This grand festival will bring you everlasting lucky!
sentences.chinese: 举国上下齐欢畅，家和国盛万事兴。

sentences.english: She did not look happy but glared at him as she moved round the customers.
sentences.chinese: 她绕过主顾走过来，双眼直瞪着他，看上往很不欢畅。

sentences.english: With skies so bright and hearts of youth so light.
sentences.chinese: 天空多明亮，青年的心多欢畅。

definition: unrestrained/cheerful lack of inhibition, esp. for drinking or sleeping/to drink with abandon
to enjoy oneself to the full/to one's heart's content
